chain 1 single_crochet in ea double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 96 single_crochet begin lace pattern round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet *chain 5 skip 3 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around ending last repeat chain 5 skip 3 single_crochet join with slip_stitch in beg single_crochet 24 chain-5 lps round 2 slip_stitch into first chain-5 space chain 3 6 double_crochet in same space single_crochet in next space chain 5 single_crochet in next space *7 double_crochet in next space single_crochet in next space chain 5 single_crochet in next space repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 eight 7-double_crochet groups round 3 slip_stitch into 2nd double_crochet of first 7-double_crochet group chain 1 single_crochet in same double_crochet chain 5 single_crochet in 6th double_crochet of same 7-double_crochet grp chain 5 single_crochet in next space chain 5 *single_crochet in 2nd double_crochet of next 7-double_crochet grp chain 5 single_crochet in 6th double_crochet of same 7-double_crochet grp chain 5 single_crochet in next space chain 5 repeat from * around join with slip_stitch in beg single_crochet 24 chain-5 loops repeat rnds 2 & 3 until a total of 30 rounds have been worked from beginning of bag base ending with round 3 top edging round 1 chain 3 *3 double_crochet in next space double_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain- 3 96 double_crochet round 2 chain 3 double_crochet in ea double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 96 double_crochet handles round 1 chain 3 double_crochet in next 13 double_crochet chain 40 skip 20 double_crochet double_crochet in next 28 double_crochet chain 40 skip 20 double_crochet double_crochet in last 14 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 136 sts & chs round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in ea double_crochet around top of bag excluding the skipped sts & ea chain of handles join with slip_stitch 136 single_crochet round 3 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around top of bag & handles join with slip_stitch 136 single_crochet fasten_off and weave in ends for optional longer handles on round 1 of handle instructions substitute the chain 40 with chain 80 or chain 100 proceed as instructed copyright 2017 2015
